actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of a mainland headquarters for the Channel Island National Monument in the State of California and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the establishment of a mainland headquarters for the Channel Islands National Monument in the State of California. Authorizes the necessary appropriations to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of a mainland headquarters for the Channel Island National Monument in the State of California and for other purposes.
